ValidationRule.description: The end date of the Outage cannot be earlier than the start date of the Outage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( YEAR(StoppageEndDate__c)< YEAR(StoppageDate__c), AND( DAY(StoppageEndDate__c) < DAY(StoppageDate__c) , MONTH(StoppageEndDate__c)= MONTH(StoppageDate__c), YEAR(StoppageEndDate__c)= YEAR(StoppageDate__c) ), AND( MONTH(StoppageEndDate__c)< MONTH(StoppageDate__c), YEAR(StoppageEndDate__c)= YEAR(StoppageDate__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The end date of the Outage cannot be earlier than the start date of the Outage.
